channel.title: Projects on Maya B. Mathur
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Maya B. Mathur

item.title: Qualtrics Mousetracker
item.description: Software in R, Javascript, and Qualtrics to design and analyze psychology experiments that use fine-grained mouse-tracking measures of perceptual category competition.

item.title: R package PublicationBias
item.description: Conducts sensitivity analysis for publication bias in meta-analyses.

item.title: R package MetaUtility
item.description: Contains functions to estimate the proportion of effects stronger than a threshold of scientific importance, to make effect size conversions, and to compute and format estimates and inference.

item.title: R package EValue
item.description: Conducts sensitivity analysis for unmeasured confounding for observational studies and meta-analysis, and conducts analogous sensitivity analyses for selection bias.

item.title: Stata module EVALUE
item.description: Calculates the E-value, a measure of sensitivity to unmeasured confounding.

item.title: E-value calculator website
item.description: Calculates the E-value, a measure of sensitivity to unmeasured confounding.

item.title: R package NRejections
item.description: Computes metrics of outcome-wide evidence strength for studies testing multiple correlated outcomes.

item.title: R package Replicate
item.description: Conducts statistical analyses for multisite replication projects.

item.title: R package SimTimeVar
item.description: Simulates a longitudinal dataset with time-varying covariates with user-specified correlation structure.
